ISSUE.TITLE: _Table.Definition.cshtml wrong boolean value check for checkBox & renderBoolean
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Steps to reproduce the problem: While upgrading from 4.10 to 4.20 I ran into a problem. In one of the plugins the checkboxes were not checked. I looked at the `_Table.Definition.cshtml` file and found the problem why this doensn't work. Currently the checkbox data value is checked like this: `data === 'true'`. `data` is not a string but a boolean. Since `data` is a boolean we do not need to explicitly check if `data == true`. (this is done for the `renderBoolean` case) Current: ``` case RenderCheckBox checkBox: render: function (data, type, row, meta) { return (data === 'true') ? '' : ''; }, break; case RenderBoolean renderBoolean: render: function (data, type, row) { return (data == true) ? '' : ''; }, break; ``` Suggested fix: ``` case RenderCheckBox checkBox: render: function (data, type, row, meta) { return data ? '' : ''; }, break; case RenderBoolean renderBoolean: render: function (data, type, row) { return data ? '' : ''; }, break; ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Don't inherit backward compatibility controllers from BasePublicController, since they only redirect requests.
